name: Sponge Wars
description:
Woosh! A space duck stole one of the sponge-ships from the evil aliens! 

In this bathroom-themed shoot-em-up, the less ammo you have, the more damage you deal, and vice-versa! Will you risk running out, or will you play it safe?

  • Aim for your new high score against the endless waves of enemies!
  • Dodge bullets and ammo pickups to keep your high damage!
  • Charming bathroom aesthetic - your pause menu is a shampoo bottle!
  • 2 distinct bosses for you to take down!
  • Also, we intentionally avoided putting any toilets in this game.

Be careful though - if the sponge gets too much water, it might overflow and explode!

Art & Sound Effects by EuSouAFazenda
Coding by Zilyanus

The music was made by Bensound, a free music service.
